sentences.en: "Beauty is only skin deep," my mother would say.
sentences.cn: “美是肤浅的。”妈妈会说。

sentences.en: a deep narrow valley
sentences.cn: 又深又窄的山谷

sentences.en: a deep wound
sentences.cn: 很深的伤口

sentences.en: Deep down, she was still a rebel.
sentences.cn: 她实质上仍是个叛逆者

sentences.en: he landed in deep water when he began the affair.
sentences.cn: 他开始婚外恋的时候就惹上麻烦了。

sentences.en: I found myself in water only three feet deep.
sentences.cn: 我发现脚下的水只有3英尺深。

sentences.en: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

sentences.en: Make deep slashes in the meat and push in the spice paste.
sentences.cn: 在肉上切出深深的口子，再把辣酱塞进切口中。

sentences.en: My allegiance to Kendall and his company ran deep.
sentences.cn: 我对肯德尔及其公司的忠诚加深了。

sentences.en: She spoke haltingly of her deep upset and hurt.
sentences.cn: 她吞吞吐吐地诉说自己深深的苦恼及伤痛。

sentences.en: She was sitting in a deep leather chair.
sentences.cn: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

sentences.en: Some bones were hidden deep beneath the ground.
sentences.cn: 一些尸骨深埋在地下。

sentences.en: Somewhere deep beneath the surface lay a caring character.
sentences.cn: 在内心深处的某个角落里埋藏着一颗爱心。

sentences.en: Sow the seeds in drills about 1/2in. deep and 12in. apart.
sentences.cn: 在深约0.5英寸，间隔12英寸的条播沟里播种。

sentences.en: Stevens's murder was the result of a deep-seated and intense hatred.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯遭谋杀源于深仇宿怨。

sentences.en: The four provinces are riven by deep family and tribal conflicts.
sentences.cn: 这4个省被严重的家族和部族纷争弄得四分五裂。

sentences.en: The memory of it all was locked deep in my subconscious.
sentences.cn: 关于它的一切记忆都深植于我的潜意识里。

sentences.en: The rough rock walls were like the sides of a deep canal.
sentences.cn: 凸凹不平的石墙就像一条很深的运河的河岸。

sentences.en: The snow, except where it drifted, was only calf-deep.
sentences.cn: 除了吹得堆积起来的地方，雪只有小腿肚深。

sentences.en: The tramp produced a stump of candle from his deep pockets.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉从深口袋里掏出了一截蜡烛。

sentences.en: The tunnel led deep under the mountains.
sentences.cn: 这条隧道在山底深处穿过。

sentences.en: There was a deep frown on the boy's face.
sentences.cn: 男孩眉头紧锁.

sentences.en: They talked deep into the night (= very late ) .
sentences.cn: 他们一直谈到深夜。

sentences.en: Tom stared deep into her eyes.
sentences.cn: 汤姆深深凝视着她的眼睛。

sentences.en: We were deep in a tropical rainforest (= far from the edge of the forest ) .
sentences.cn: 我们在热带雨林深处。

words.tran_cn: 使深化；加深（deepen的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 深陷(于)，专心致力(于)，埋头(于)；沉湎于…中，全神贯注的
深海；深海的；深深的海洋
深度睡眠；睡眠的深层状态

phrases.phrase: go off (或 go in off) the deep end

phrases.tran_cn: —深陷其中，深深卷入(尤指麻烦)

phrases.phrase: jump (或 be thrown) in at the deep end

trans.tran_cn: 深的，宽的，有…深的，深呼吸的，靠近对方端线的，极度的，严重的，酣睡的，专注于，强烈的，衷心的，难懂的，低沉的，城府深的，渊博的
trans.tran_en: going far in from the outside or from the front edge of something

trans.tran_cn: 深深地，深入地，本质上，在内心深处，深陷(债务等中)
trans.tran_en: a long way into or below the surface of something
going far in from the outside or from the front edge of something
